summaries.title: Why Meta want allow Donald Trump back on Facebook and Instagram
summaries.description:
Mr Trump get exclusivity agreement wit Truth Social - e mean say im dey legally required to post first on di platform - six hours before any oda platform. 
E also mean say if im post on Facebook or Twitter -  dem fit sue am.

summaries.title: Authorities find Second batch of classified Biden documents
summaries.description: Di original cache dey under review by US prosecutors, for political embarrassment for di White House.
summaries.imageAlt: Joe Biden dey tok to Journalist

summaries.title: 'Trump Organization dey guilty of tax crimes'
summaries.description: Jury for New York don find Donald Trump family real estate company guilty of tax crimes.

summaries.title: House Democrats don get access to Donald Trump tax returns
summaries.description: Donald Trump bin almost stop di investigation of im tax returns  by di House committee before di Supreme court declaration.

summaries.title: Supreme Court clear Congress to check Trump tax records
summaries.description: Congressional Democrats bin don dey chase access to oga Trump financial records for di past three years.
summaries.imageAlt: Trump dey tok to tori pipo

summaries.title: Trump go return to Twitter? Account of di former US president reappear afta Musk lift suspension
summaries.description: Twitter bin suspend Donald Trump account for 2021 sake of di risk say e dey incite violence.

summaries.title: '﻿I go fight like no one don ever fight before' - Trump
summaries.description: Former US president, Donald Trump say im plan to run for di US presidency in 2024.

summaries.title: Trump drop strong hint say e fit run for White House 2024
summaries.description: E tell one crowd in Sioux City, Iowa, say e go "very, very, very probably do am again" for 2024.

summaries.title: Trump court order: Former president get court order to testify to January 6 committee
summaries.description: One lawyer for Trump accuse di lawmakers for di committee say dem dey "break di rules".

summaries.title: US justice department wan unseal Trump warrant
summaries.description: Di FBI bin search Mr Trump's Florida home on Monday - di unsealed warrant fit reveal why.
summaries.imageAlt: Trump hold one first in di air

summaries.title: Trump say FBI agents 'raid' im house for Mar-a-Lago Florida
summaries.description: Donald Trump tok say "large group of FBI agents" occupy im house for Mar-a-Lago wey dey Palm Beach.

summaries.title: Who be Ivana Trump, Donald Trump first wife wey die at di age of 73 ?
summaries.description: Di former president Donald Trump describe im ex-wife as a "wonderful, beautiful and amazing woman".
summaries.imageAlt: Ivana and Donald Trump for di 1985 Met Gala

summaries.title: Profile of Ivana Trump, Donald Trump first wife wey die at di age of 73
summaries.description: Di former president Donald Trump describe im ex-wife as a "wonderful, beautiful and amazing woman".
summaries.imageAlt: Ivana and Donald Trump for di 1985 Met Gala

summaries.title: Trump dey accused of 'attempted coup' sake of Capitol riot
summaries.description: Trump supporters bin storm enta Congress on 6 January 2021 as lawmakers bin gada to certify di electin victory of Joe Biden.

summaries.title: Trump social-media platform don go live
summaries.description: Truth Social, don launch, for limited form, on US Apple App Store.
summaries.imageAlt: Truth Social will be run by the former US president's newly created Trump Media & Technology Group

summaries.title: Wetin happun for January 6 one year ago?
summaries.description: Here na reminder of wetin happun on di historic day when rioters storm di Capitol exactly one year ago.
summaries.imageAlt: January 6 timeline: Wetin happun for January 6 one year ago?

summaries.title: Why Donald Trump say Bitcoin na scam
summaries.description: Former US President Donald Trump don tell Fox Business say im see Bitcoin as 'scam" wey dey affect di value of di US dollar.

summaries.title: Wetin be dis new 'website' wey Donald Trump launch?
summaries.description: Users of Donald Trump new website go dey able to like posts - and also share them on Twitter and Facebook accounts.

summaries.title: Three things Donald Trump reveal during Hannity TV interview
summaries.description: Di one hour special interview happen ontop Trump Mar-a-Lago resort for Palm Beach, Florida and na im first major television interview since e comot office.
summaries.imageAlt: "Donald Trump interview today": [Sean Hannity television program wit 46th US president]

summaries.title: How pipo react to Trump ''Radical left Crazies'' Easter Message
summaries.description: Dis no go be di first time di former presido go comot address di nation since im comot presidency.

summaries.title: How many law suits Trump go face now wey im no be president
summaries.description: About fourteen different cases against Trump, im family and business dey court.

summaries.title: Five tins Trump tok for im first political appearance afta e comot White House
summaries.description: Di former president for im first political appearance for one conservative conference for Florida also tok say im fit run for presidency again for 2024.

summaries.title: US Senate fail to convict Trump, everytin you suppose know about Trump impeachment
summaries.description: A total of 57 senators vote to convict di former president, far short of di 67 votes dem need.

summaries.title: Trump second impeachment trial don begin
summaries.description: Trump dey face one single charge of "incitement of insurrection" for di speech wey im make to im supporters ahead of di deadly riot for US Capitol for January.
